questList.questDescription: Navigate the intricate Abyssal Caverns and either defeat or ally with one of the following: Shadowed Soulstalkers/Kraitha the Soulslasher or Twilight Serpentscales/Nagrodil the Duskblade.
Seek unity in the depths as you forge an alliance with either Whispering Haunters/Xaltherion the Ephemeral or Dreaded Maws of Abyss/Xylothor the Devourer.
Eliminate the threat by defeating Blackened Shroudcasters/Necrathys the Voidweaver in the treacherous Abyssal Caverns.

Navigate the Serpentine Shoreline and confront the choice of either allying with or vanquishing Gorthak the Boulderfiend/Stonecrusher Ravagers or Bloodbound Enchantresses/Maralys the Sanguine Sorceress.
In the dim twilight, seek unity with Abyssal Soulshadows/Maerthas the Void Wraith among the shadows of the Shoreline.
Unveil the darkness lurking within the Sorcerers and defeat Pyrothor the Infernocaller of the Molten Conjurers in the Serpentine Shoreline.
Confront the ultimate evil by defeating Thalassakor the Leviathan in his treacherous Lair.
Discover hope in the midst of darkness as you unite with the spirits to earn the Amulet of Healing.
Subjugate the unfathomable powers by defeating Kethraa the Submerged Sentinel among the Abyssal Legion in the heart of Leviathan's Lair.
